appearances.title: U.S. House of Representatives U.S. House of Representatives : CSPAN : January 14, 2026 1:30pm-3:42pm EST
appearances.snippet: nick lalota. >> and how much time is. >> two minutes? mr. >> the gentleman. >> mr. >> chairman, the gentleman is recognized for two minutes. >> mr. chairman, long islanders face some of the highest tax burdens anywhere in the nation. at the same time, america, with our $38 trillion in debt, needs to start to freeze and cut spending wherever possible. and when we deal with those financial issues, lawmakers in this body would be wise to protect important government services. thankfully, the fy 26 financial services and general government bill, which is on the floor today and cut spending by $140 million, sends a clear message that washington is doing its part to ease, not add to our tax and deficit burden, all while protecting important government services. that is why i rise today in strong support of this bill. as vice chair of fssg and under the strong leadership of chairman cole and chairman joyce, our subcommittee worked to deliver a disciplined funding package that addresses the real pressures facing families and businesses back home
